quest.name: Sheep Snatcher
journal: Sukegei has been abandoned by his favorite sheep.
objectives: Use the blowgun to shoot the lost lamb from the designated location.
Deliver the lost lamb to Sukegei.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: Don't suppose you have time to chase after a sheep do you? My most cowardly one just ran off after hearing a nearby beast's roar.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: She is so timid she is likely to run away if you try to approach her normally.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: Take this blowgun and these darts that I've laced with a sedative. One hit and she will be out in an instant. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: Use that blowgun I gave you to put my sheep to sleep. She ran off somewhere to the west. Best of luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The lost lamb is wary of your presence.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: You are going to need to put her to sleep first if you are to have any chance of catching her.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: Did you manage to catch my sheep?

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! You had me worried sick you did, deary.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: This job means everything to me. It truly does.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: I was just a lonely orphan with nowhere to call my own when the Mol took me in. I said I would look after our sheep in an attempt to show my gratitude.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: My heart nearly stopped when this little one ran away. Sheep are the cornerstone of our tribe's way of life.

dialogue.name: SUKEGEI
dialogue.text: I fear I will never be able to truly express my thanks to you, but know I am grateful.
